title: Two Way Player Utility: PERMISSIONS
custom_steps:
Utility will not be editable by Club Users

**New Groups:**
ebis-widget-twowayplayer-editors
ebis-widget-twowayplayer-viewers

**Role Assignments:**

**BOC:**
ebis-proplayer-boc-admin-role 
 - ebis-widget-twowayplayer-editors

ebis-proplayer-boc-viewer-role 
 - ebis-widget-twowayplayer-viewers

**Club:**
ebis-proplayer-club-admin-role 
 - ebis-widget-twowayplayer-viewers

ebis-proplayer-club-viewer-role 
 - ebis-widget-twowayplayer-viewers

title: As a User, I want to see a Two-Way Player tab on the Rosters Dashboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on Roster Dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN club user navigates to tabs on Roster Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN user will be able to view the TWO-WAY PLAYER tab
AND "TWO-WAY PLAYER TAB" will appear after 'SPECIAL ROSTERS' tab

title: As a User, I want to see the Two-Way Player widget on the Two-Way Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on ROSTERS dashboard
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc
https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_club

Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

WHEN user clicks on 'TWO-WAY PLAYER' tab
custom_expected:
THEN 'TWO-WAY PLAYER' widget will load
AND  widget will match provided wire and data discovery

title: As a BOC User, I want to set positions for the players on my Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC USER
AND user has navigated to Two-Way Player widget
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

WHEN user clicks on "PENCIL ICON" on each a player's row
AND  user clicks on "SAVE" button
AND  user clicks on "CANCEL" button
custom_expected:
THEN that player's row will enter into 'EDIT MODE' 
AND  player's POS can be selected from Dropdown in "POS" column
AND  If "Saved" is clicked, changes are committed and all rows are returned to view mode
AND  If "Cancel all changes" button is clicked, changes are dismissed and all rows are returned to view mode

title: As a User, I want to see a pitcher stats on my Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to TWO-WAY PLAYERS widget
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

WHEN user is viewing "Innings Pitched" column in Two Way Player widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Innings Pitched" column will display count for Innings Pitched for current year
AND  IF player has not pitched any inning, the column will be blank
AND  IF player has pitched any innings, "INNINGS PITCHED" column will display data in format (i.e. 30.1 or 35.2)

title: As a User, I want to see position player's stats on my Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on 'Two-Way Player' widget
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc


WHEN user is viewing 'Starts at Pos Player' column
custom_expected:
THEN column will display stats, for current year as Games started as a position player or designated hitter (with at least three plate appearances in each of those games)
AND If the player has not started any games that meet the definition, the column will be blank
AND The column header will have a tool tip with the following text:
-- "Games started as a position player or designated hitter (with at least three plate appearances in each of those games)"

title: As a User, I want to see a when a player is approaching the Two-Way Player threshold on the Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN  User wants to see when a player is approaching TWP threshold
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

WHEN User is viewing Two Way Player widget
custom_expected:
THEN   Player will be considered 'Approaching' when player reaches 15 IP or 15 GS*
AND    If a player reaches 15 IP or 15 GS*, his stats will change color (depicted in the wire) 
If player's position is set as a pitcher, check against IP
-- Position in: LHR, LHS, RHR, RHS
If player's position is set as a position player, check against GS
-- Position in: C, IF, SS, UTL, 1B, 2B, 3B, CF, LF, OF, RF, DH, PH

title: As a User, I want to see a when a player is crosses the Two-Way Player threshold on the Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the User is viewing the Two-Way Player widget 
AND wants to view who crossed TWP threshold
custom_steps:
WHEN the User is searching the Two-Way Player widget for players that crossed the Two Way Player threshold

Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget
custom_expected:
THEN The Two-Way Player threshold will be considered 20 IP or 20 GS*
AND  If a player reaches 20 IP or 20 GS*, his stats will change color to green (depicted in the wire)
AND  When a player reaches 20 IP & 20 GS*, a clipboard notification will be generated for both the player's club and the BOC

title: As a BOC User, I want to designate a player as a Two-Way Player on the Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC user
AND   has navigated to the Two Way Player widget
AND  is viewing player who eligible for TWP designation
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC USER navigates to "Designate Two-Way Player" column in Two-Way Player Utility


Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget
custom_expected:
THEN   "Eligible" will appear in view mode for player who is eligible for Two-Way Player designation
AND     when row is in edit mode, the checkbox will be available to check
AND     when checkbox is checked, TWP POS dropdown is enabled 
AND     user can select TWP POS
AND     when a row is in edit mode, there will be Save and Cancel all changes buttons
         -- If Save is clicked, changes are committed and all rows are returned to view mode
         -- If Cancel is clicked, changes are dismissed and all rows are returned to view mode

title: As a BOC User, I want to set a players second position on the Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC user
AND   is viewing the Two Way Player widget
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC USER navigates to "Designate Two-Way Player" column in Two-Way Player Utility 
AND  has designated player as TWP

Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget
custom_expected:
THEN  TWP POS dropdown is enabled 
AND   The position dropdown will only become active if the checkbox in the same column is checked
AND   can select TWP POS from dropdown menu
AND   when a row is in edit mode, there will be Save and Cancel all changes buttons
       -- If Save is clicked, changes are committed and all rows are returned to view mode
       -- If Cancel is clicked, changes are dismissed and all rows are returned to view mode

title: As User, I want to see a Two-Way Players Displayed as TWP
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget


WHEN a player is designated as a "Two-Way Player"
custom_expected:
THEN their position will be displayed as TWP throughout the UI
AND this includes, but is not limited to:
 -- fixed header on profile
 -- widgets
 -- transactions etc
AND TWP should not appear in any position dropdown

title: As User, I want Two-Way Player to be included on the Email Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Utilities portion of the Email Utility
custom_expected:
THEN Two-Way Players Notifications will be added to the utility
AND users will be able to be added for each club and the BOC

title: As BOC User, I don't want Club Users to be able to edit the position of any player on the 40-Man Roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club

Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3774874/Info+Tab+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to baseball info section of player profile
AND  clicking edit
custom_expected:
THEN if a player is on the 40-man roster, with any status, the player's position will not be editable to any Club User
AND position on 40-man players will now only be editable to BOC Users.

title: As a User, I want to see the number of pitchers on Roster Dashboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire: 
https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=roster_widget_changes
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the roster dashboard
custom_expected:
THE the Roster Dashboard will display the number of pitchers on a team's roster
AND this will be a count of players with one of the following positions:
-- LHR, LHS, RHR, RHS
AND the layout will match the provided wire
AND there will be a tooltip that appears when hovering over the Active Roster Count and the Pitcher count
AND the tooltip will match the provided layout
AND Position players will count if they are one of the following positions:
-- C, IF, SS, UTL, 1B, 2B, 3B, CF, LF, OF, RF, DH, PH

title: As User, I want the Two-Way Player Utility to roll over at the end of the season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the day after the last day of the regular season is reached
custom_expected:
THEN the widget will roll over to the next year
AND a snapshot will be taken of the widget at this time and stored
AND Users will be able to access past year snapshots using the years header filter on the widget
AND the snapshot will reflect the EOS positions, and stats of each org

title: As User, I want Designating a player as a Two-Way player to create a line item on the Player's History
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player is Designated as a Two-Way Player on the Utility
custom_expected:
THEN a new row will be created on the Player History of the player's profile
-- Date: [Date the player was designated]
-- Code: TWP
-- Description: Designated as Two-Way Player

title: As User, I want Designating a player as a Two-Way player to appear on the Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player is Designated as a Two-Way Player on the Utility
custom_expected:
THEN a new row will be created on the Transaction Bulletin
-- Org: Player's Org
-- Player: Last, First
-- Pos: Player's Position
-- Current MLS: Player's Current MLS
-- Transaction Date: [Date the player was designated]
-- Approval Date: [Date and Time the player was designated]
-- Description: Designated as Two-Way Player

title: As User, I want to receive an email when a player is approaching the Two-Way Player threshold
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player is considered to be approaching (15 IP or 15 GS)
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to the player's club as members of the BOC and indicated on the email utility:
- Subject: Player Approaching Two-Way Player Threshold
- Content: [Player Roster First] [Player Last] is approaching the threshold for Two-Way Player designation. Please log into EBIS to review and contact BOC with any questions or concerns.

AND the email will contain a link to the Two-Way Player Utility

title: As User, I want to receive an email when a player crosses the Two-Way Player threshold
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player has crossed the threshold for two-way player designation (20 IP and 20 GS)
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to the player's club and members of the BOC as indicated on the email utility:
- Subject: Player Has Reached Two-Way Player Threshold
- Content: [Player Roster First] [Player Last] has satisfied the criteria for being designated a Two-Way Player.

In the event that you would like [Player Roster First] [Player Last] to officially be considered a Two-Way Player per the Major League Rules, you must contact BOC to make that change. Until BOC has approved the change, [Player Last] will continue to be considered a (BOC Position) for the purposes of pitcher and position player roster limits.

AND the email will contain a link to the Two-Way Player Utility

title: As User, I want to see a Two-Way Player Displayed as TWP on reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player is designated as a Two-Way Player
custom_expected:
THEN their position will be displayed as TWP, on all reports
AND This will require identifying all reports that include postion
AND updating all views necessary to accommodate the change
AND verifying report did not break after inclusion of TWP
-- Assumption is sorting / grouping will break on some reports

title: As User, I want to be informed of the position my player is being added to the roster with when creating the transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club
AND  player selected has 0.00 MLS for current year
custom_steps: WHEN adding a player who has not yet accrued an active day of MJ service in the current year to the 40-Man Roster
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction moving the player to the roster will display the following message to the club user:
- "Player will be added to the roster as a pitcher|position player. If you would like this changed, please contact BOC.
AND this includes these transactions
- MJ Selection
- Sign Free Agent
- Recall
AND if MJ Stat position is blank, use MN Stat position

title: As a User, I want players who were Eligible or Designated as a Two-Way Player to Retain Prior Season's Designation
custom_preconds: GIVEN player was eligible or designated as TWP the prior season
custom_steps: WHEN player, who had become eligible or was designated as a two-way player, is removed from the 40-man roster prior to accruing an active day of service AND  is then added back to the roster during season
custom_expected:
THEN player will retain the prior season's status/designation
AND will default back to the same positions he had the the prior season

title: As a User, I want the TWP Widget to have data when it rolls over to a new year
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the day after the last day of the regular season is reached
custom_expected:
THEN the TWP Widget will roll over to the next year
AND a snapshot will be taken of the widget at this time and stored
AND Users will be able to access past year snapshots using the years header filter on the widget
AND the snapshot will reflect the EOS positions, and stats of each org

title: As a User, I want player profile headers updated to account for TWP
custom_steps:
WHEN viewing header of players who have been designated as Two-Way Player,

Wire: https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=info
custom_expected:
THEN the position field label will appear as "Pos/TWP"
AND  the first position will be POS from baseball info section
AND  the second position will be TWP POS from baseball info section
AND  for non 40-man players or 40- man players who have not been designated as TWP the position field will display as either POS or POS (baseball/stats)

title: As a User, I want Baseball Info section on player profiles updated to account for TWP
custom_preconds: GIVEN player has been designated as TWP
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Two-Way Player's baseball info section
custom_expected:
THEN  Baseball Info section of profile will update to include POS, Stats POS, TWP POS, and Two-Way Player checkbox
AND   TWP POS will only be visible/editable if TWP flag is set
AND   TWP POS is required if TWP flag is set
AND   these fields are only editable by BOC Users

title: As a BOC User, I want Clubs to be prevented from Transferring a player to a ST Facility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as CLUB USER (ex: NYY-admin)
AND has created a preliminary Transfer transaction for a Minor League player
custom_steps: WHEN  club user clicks "Transfer To" dropdown menu
custom_expected:
THEN all Club's affiliates will be displayed
AND  affiliates designated as 'ST Facility' will appear grayed out with "BOC" appended to the end
AND  club users will be able to see affiliates designated as ST Facility
AND  club users will not be able to select affiliate designated as ST facility
AND  BOC Users will be able to Transfer players to ST Facilities normally

title: As a BOC User, I want Clubs to be prevented from Transferring an Optioned player to a ST Facility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as CLUB USER (ex: Test- NYY-Admin)
and is viewing a preliminary "Transfer of Option" tx
custom_steps: WHEN  club user clicks "Assign To" dropdown menu
custom_expected:
THEN  all that Club's affiliates will be displayed in the 'Transfer To' dropdown
AND   Affiliates that have the 'ST Facility' checkbox checked on their profile will appear grayed out with 'BOC' appended to the end
AND   Club Users will be able to see affiliates designated as ST Facility but will not be able to select them
AND   BOC Users will be able to Transfer players to ST Facilities normally

title: As a User, I want players optioned to ST Facilities to continue accruing service
custom_steps: WHEN player is optioned to a ST facility
custom_expected:
THEN they will continue to accrue MJ Service until conclusion of championship season
AND service calcs will work as if player stayed at MJ level
AND Players transferred to a ST facility will not accrue MJ Service

title: As a User, I want a new "First day of optioned MLS" system date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to view new "First day of optioned MLS" date
AND   is on System Dates tab
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to 'System Dates' sub tab from System Tab in left nav
AND  expands Baseball Ops section
custom_expected: THEN user will see a new "First day of optioned MLS" system date

title: As a User, I want to be warned if a player I'm optioning may cross the Super 2 threshold by EOS
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to see Warning Message for players who may cross Super 2
custom_steps:
WHEN  user selects a non-ST Facility affiliate from dropdown menu
AND   assignment date is on or after the "First day of optioned MLS" system date
custom_expected:
THEN  the system will project the players end of season MJ Service time
AND
IF    the projected EOS MJ Service is within 5 days of Super 2 cut off, system will return warning message:
*Body:*  Per MLR xxx, any player optioned on or after September 1 will receive MLS regardless of the timing of his option if: (A) the player was continuously on the Active Roster or Injured List of the Club from June 1 through the date of the assignment and; and (B) the assignment would deprive the player of sufficient service to become eligible for salary arbitration under Article VI(E)(1) immediately following the season.  This player's current MLS is projected to be close to the Super 2 cut off.  Please be aware that in the event that the player ends up meeting the criteria listed above, the player's deprived MLS will be retroactively refunded and the player will qualify as a Super 2.
  -- *Buttons:*  Continue, Back

title: As a User, I want to be warned if a player I'm optioning may cross the XX (B) threshold by EOS
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has created a preliminary "Optional Assignment" tx
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a non-ST Facility affiliate from dropdown menu
AND enters "assignment date" on or after "First day of optioned MLS" system date
custom_expected:
THEN  the system will project the players end of season MJ servce time
AND 
IF    the projected EOS MJ Service is within 5 days of XX(B) threshold (6.000), the system will return a warning message:
    -- *Body:*  Per MLR xxx, any player optioned on or after September 1 will receive MLS regardless of the timing of his option if: (A) the player was continuously on the Active Roster or Injured List of the Club from June 1 through the date of the assignment and; and (B) the assignment would deprive the player of sufficient service to become eligible for free agency under Article XX(B)(1) immediately following the season.  This player's current MLS is projected to be at or over 6.000.  Please be aware that in the event that the player ends up meeting the criteria listed above, the player's deprived MLS will be retroactively refunded and the player will become a XXB free agent.
  -- *Buttons:*  Continue, Back

title: As a User, I want the Active MJ Roster Limit to be increased to 26
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing MJ Roster Summary screen
custom_steps: WHEN viewing "Active Roster" limit count between Opening Day and Roster Expansion date
custom_expected:
THEN Active Roster limit will now display 26
AND  when roster count is 26 it will display as green and turn red at 27 and above
AND roster notification batch will create notifications when over new limit of 26

title: As a User, I want new max Roster Limits for September
custom_preconds: GIVEN is viewing Active Roster count on/after Roster Expansion date through End of Season
custom_steps: WHEN roster expands on Roster Expansion day
custom_expected:
THEN new Active Roster max limit will be 28 and color will be green
AND  if Active Count is anything other than 28, number will display as red on roster summary screens
AND roster notification batch will be update to create notifications if count is anything other than 28 during September
AND "Under Control" limit will remain at 40

title: As a User, I want to create a new Appointment of 27th Man for a player
custom_steps:
Related to: #115265699

WHEN user creates new "Appointment of 27th Man" tx
custom_expected:
THEN  This new transaction should work the same way as the Appointment of 26th Man transaction
AND  The existing Appointment of 26th Man transaction will be hidden / archived
AND  Will be maintained historically, but will no longer be able to be created

title: As a User, I want to create a new Return of 27th Man for a player
custom_steps:
Related to: #115265883

WHEN user creates a new "Return of 27th Man" tx

AC:
 - A new Return of 27th Man transaction will be created as a result of increasing the Roster Limits
custom_expected:
THEN This new transaction should work the same way as the Return of 26th Man transaction
AND  The existing Return of 26th Man transaction will be hidden / archived
AND  Will be maintained historically, but will no longer be able to be created

title: Other 27th Man Transactions
custom_steps:
Related to: #113792721

WHEN player is Reinstated from Injured List or Inactive List as 27th man 
AND is then optioned within 2 days of Reinstatement
custom_expected:
THEN player history row will be updated to display "Reinstate from IL as 27th man" or "Reinstate from Inactive List as 27th man"
AND  player history row will be updated to display that the Optional Assignment "Completes the 27th man process"

title: As a User, I want players optioned to ST Facilities to receive an option days as well as service days
custom_steps: WHEN player is optioned to a ST-Facility
custom_expected:
THEN player will receive Optioned Days as well as MJ service Days
AND user can view in service tab on player profile

title: As a User, I want Option Tracking Batch updated for players optioned to ST Facilities
custom_steps:
AC:
 - Update option tracking batch to count the new days towards the total option days, but to not give them back as service if the total is less than 20 days

title: As a User, I want Roster Affected types on DFA Transactions updated with new rosters
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating a Designate for Assignment tx
custom_steps:
WHEN user is viewing the 'Roster Affected' section prior to roster expansion
AND  user is viewing the 'Roster Affected' section after roster expansion
custom_expected:
THEN user will see new 26th man option and 40 man option prior to roster expansion
AND after roster expansion date, 28th man option will be available along with 26 and 40 man options
AND 25 man option will no longer be available at any time

title: As a User, I want to Pitcher Limits added to MJ Rosters
custom_preconds: GIVEN User want to see "Pitcher Limit" count added to MJ Rosters
custom_steps: WHEN  user is viewing "Pitcher" count on MJ Rosters
custom_expected:
THEN from Opening Day to the day before the roster expansion date, the maximum number of pitchers allowed on a MJ Active Roster is 13
AND from the roster expansion date to the end of the season, the maximum number of pitchers allowed on a MJ Active Roster is 14
AND these values should be easily configurable on the system values screen (LRD Tab)
  -- Number of Pitchers
  -- Number of Pitchers After Expansion
AND the pitcher count on the Roster Summary screen should turn Red if the number of pitchers on the Active MJ roster is greater than the applicable number
AND the Roster notification batch should be updated to generate notifications if a club has more than the allowable number of pitchers
AND Two-Way player count as position players

title: I want to see warnings if I create a transaction that will put me over the pitcher limit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to see an error message when passing the allowable limit of pitchers on roster
AND   users Club pitcher roster count is at Max capacity
custom_steps: WHEN  user adds player to roster that will put club over pitcher limit count
custom_expected:
THEN  the system will return an overridable warning
AND   warning will also be included in Two-Way Player widget

title: As a User, I want Reports that include roster counts to display a break down by position
custom_steps:
AC:
 - Any ML Report that includes roster counts (below), should show a breakdown of Pitchers and Non-Pitchers following Total Active
  -- i.e. Total Active - 26  Total Pitchers - 13  Total Non-Pitchers  - 13  Total Under Control - 40

  -- MJ Roster
  -- PIS 
  -- Opening Day Roster
  -- Post Season Eligibility Roster
  -- Wild Card roster
  -- Division Series Roster
  -- LCS Roster
  -- World Series Roster
  -- Reserve List
  -- Reserve List Submission
  -- Roster Detail
  -- Roster Number Breakdown (Already shows players vs pitchers, but will need to be adjusted )
  -- Org Chart

title: As a User, I want to create a Place on 15-day IL transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to create a Place on 15 - Day IL transaction
custom_steps:
WHEN user creates new transaction for player

Wireframe:
https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=place_on_10-day_dl

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/2.+Place+on+10-Day+DL

Acceptance Criteria:
custom_expected:
THEN There will be a new Place on 15-Day IL transaction available under Transaction > Major > Injured List in the Create New menu
AND  This will be on the Create New button on the Player History widget and Rosters widget for all players
AND  Selecting "Place on 15-Day IL" will perform a Rule Check to see if the players is a Pitcher or a TWP
 - If the player is not a pitcher or a TWP, the system will return an error message:
  -- "Player must be a Pitcher or Two-Way Player to be placed on the 15-Day Injured List.  Please contact the BOC with any questions."
  -- Buttons: Back
AND The new transaction will will follow the same layout and rules as the existing 10-Day Injured List transaction
AND The calculated Earliest Reinstatement Date will reflect the 15 day timeframe

title: As a User, I want to create a Transfer to 15-day IL transaction
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=transfer_player_to_15-day_dl

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/3.+Transfer+to+10-Day+DL

Acceptance Criteria:
 - There will be a new Transfer to 15-Day IL transaction available under Transaction > Major > Injured List in the Create New menu
 - This will be on the Create New button on the Player History widget and Rosters widget for all players
 - Selecting "Transfer to 15-Day IL" will perform a Rule Check to see if the players is a Pitcher or a TWP
 - If the player is not a pitcher or a TWP, the system will return an error message:
  -- "Player must be a Pitcher or Two-Way Player to be transferred to the 15-Day Injured List.  Please contact the BOC with any questions."
  -- Buttons: Back
 - The new transaction will will follow the same layout and rules as the existing 10-Day Injured List transaction
 - The calculated Earliest Reinstatement Date will reflect the 15 day timeframe

title: Testing: Transfer Player from 15-Day IL to 60-Day IL
As a User, I want to Rule Check added to Place on 10-Day IL transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to see warning message when placing a pitcher or TWP on 10 Day IL
custom_steps: WHEN user creates 'Place on 10-Day IL' tx, Check position to make sure player is not a pitcher or a TWP
custom_expected:
THEN system will perform a Rule Check to see if the player is a Pitcher or a TWP
 - If the player is a pitcher or a TWP, the system will return an error message:
  -- "Pitchers and Two-Way Players may not be placed on the 10-Day Injured List.  Please contact the BOC with any questions."
  -- Buttons: Back

title: As a User, I want to Rule Check added to Transfer to 10-Day IL transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to see warning message when attempting to transfer pitcher/TWP to 10 day IL
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a 'Transfer to 10-Day IL' tx
custom_expected:
THEN system will perform rule check to see if the player is a Pitcher or a TWP
AND  if player is a Pitcher or a TWP, the system will return an error message:
-- "Pitcher and Two-Way Players may not be transferred to the 10-Day Injured List. Please contact the BOC with any questions."
-- Buttons: Back

title: As a User, I want players on the 15-Day IL to be Recertified for 15 Days
custom_steps:
Players on the 15-Day IL get recertified for 15 Days

Calculation of dates on the transaction screen

Wire:
https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=recertify_a_player

AC:
 - When re-certifying a player on the 15-Day IL, the Earliest Reinstatement Date will be calculated to reflect the 15 Day term for recertification

title: As a User, I want Recertification Widget updated for 15-Day IL Transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN USER has placed pitcher/TWP on new 15-day IL
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Recertification Widget

Wire:
https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=recertification

AC:
 - Updates will be made to the Recertification Widget to accommodate the new 15-Day IL
  -- Recertification Due dates will be calculated using the 15 day period
  -- Alerts and color changes (i.e. when a recert is passed due) will be calculated using the 15 day period
custom_expected:
THEN Recertification Widget will accommodate the new 15-day IL
AND  Recertification Due Dates will be calculated using the 15 day period for 15 Day IL
AND  Alerts and color changes will be calculated using the 15 day period

title: As a User, I want reporting updates for 15-Day IL
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has placed pitcher/TWP on 15 - Day IL
custom_steps:
WHEN user runs reports

 - Reserve List
 - Roster Snapshot
 - Org Chart
 - Player Info Summary
custom_expected: THEN Report views should be updated to accommodate the new 15-Day IL roster status

title: As a User, I want a Rule Check added to Recall Transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to see error message for pitcher/TWP who has not been optionally assigned for min. of 15 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve a 'Recall' tx
custom_expected:
THEN system will perform a Rule check to see if player is a pitcher or TWP
AND - If the player is a pitcher or a TWP, and has not been optionally assigned for at least 15 days, the system will return an error message:
"Player must be on option for at least 15 days if he is not replacing another Player."
AND error should be blocker for clubs, overridable for BOC
AND Player to Replace Check box should be available (only if Placement Date is <15 days)
AND User should be able to pick a player from the dropdown
AND submitting with a player selected in the dropdown should not fire the error/warning

title: As a User, I want the UI logic updated to display correct Earliest Recall Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to see the new earliest recall date for pitchers or TWP who was optioned to MNs
custom_steps:
WHEN user creates an 'Optional Assignment' tx for pitcher or TWP
AND when tx is approved 
Wires:
MJ Roster:  https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=major_league_roster
Player Profiles: https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=waivers___transactions
custom_expected:
THEN the 'Eligible Recall Date' on the UI will be updated to account for 15 day minimum for pitchers and TWP in following
 - MJ Roster Widget
 - Player Profile (option section of transactions tab)

title: As a User, I want Report logic updated to display correct Earliest Recall Dates
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to see view new Earliest Recall Dates for pitchers and TWP in reports
custom_steps: WHEN user opens Player Information Report,
custom_expected: THEN the new earliest recall date will update to display minimum assignment of 15 days

title: As a User, I want to flag an affiliate as a ST Facility
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to designate MN affiliate as a Spring Training Facility
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to profile of MN league affiliate

Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3798090/MN+Affiliate+Profiles+Widget+-+Data+Discovery

AC:
 - On MN Affiliate profiles, there will be a new 'ST Facility' checkbox in the Affiliate Info section
 - This checkbox will default to blank and will not be required
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new 'ST Facility' checkbox in the Affiliate Info section
AND this checkbox will default to blank and will not be required

title: As a User, I want to be stopped from Optioning a player to the ST Facility prior to the Org's Max MN Playoff End Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to be prevented from optioning player to ST-facility until all the MN affiliates in his Org have completed their season
custom_steps:
WHEN user creates a new Optional Assignment
AND  selects a ST-Facility from the Assign To dropdown


*An affiliate that has the ST Facility checkbox checked on its affiliate profile*
custom_expected:
THEN  system will perform a check to determine max Last Playoff Date of all MN affiliates in ORG
AND - If the Assignment Date is greater than the max MN Last Playoff Date, the transaction may be created and submitted normally
AND - If the Assignment Date is on or prior to the max MN Last Playoff Date, the system will return a hard error to clubs:
  -- *Body:* Players may not be Optioned to a ST Facility until all affiliates have completed their season.  Please contact the BOC for more information.
  -- *Buttons:* Back
AND  This will be an overrideable warning for BOC Users

title: New Visa Fees Field in AMT
custom_preconds: User
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to 'Travel Expenses' section of 'Travel Auth Form' in AMT


Wires:
Travel Auth Form: https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B
Visa Fees Modal: https://zpl.io/adwj9pL

AC:
 - There will be a new "Visa Fees" field added to Travel Expenses section of the Travel Auth Form in AMT, as depicted in the wire
 - There will be an icon next to the field name
 - Clicking the icon will display the following description in a modal:
  -- "Standard fees associated with required visa application for permissible tryout."
custom_expected:
THEN user will be able to view new "Visa Fees" field 
AND there will be an icon next to the field name
AND clicking the icon will display the following description in a modal:
   -- "Standard fees associated with required visa application for permissible tryout."

title: As a developer I would like to add the ability to clone a production user in a non production environment
custom_preconds: NOTE:FOR THIS TEST CASE WE WILL NEED TO CONFIRM THAT THIS FUNCTIONALITY WORKS IN "NON-PROD" ENVIRONMENTS BUT THIS FUNCTIONALITY SHOULD NOT EXIST IN PRODUCTION
custom_steps:
On the user accounts page in a non production environment once a user is loaded there should be an option to clone an existing production user.  

The list of production users should be within the same org as the loaded user

Cloning will remove and store all permission for the existing user and replace them with the ones associated with the prod user.

title: As a developer I would like to revert a cloned production user in a non production environment back to the user's original permissions
custom_preconds: NOTE:FOR THIS TEST CASE WE WILL NEED TO CONFIRM THAT THIS FUNCTIONALITY WORKS IN "NON-PROD" ENVIRONMENTS BUT THIS FUNCTIONALITY SHOULD NOT EXIST IN PRODUCTION
custom_steps:
On the user accounts page in a non production environment once a previously cloned user is loaded there should be:
An indicator that the user is cloned and to which production account they are cloned.  
An option to revert the user back to their original permissions.

title: As a User, I want to see a Blank Trade Checklist In the Reporting Menu
custom_steps:
AC:
 - There will be a Trade Checklist link under the reporting menu in ebis
 - Clicking the link will open a PDF of the Trade Checklist
 - All the possible "values" will be visible
 - There will be no specific player information included on this checklist

title: As a User, I want to see a Blank Consent to Re-selection from In the Reporting Menu
custom_steps:
AC:
 - There will be a Consent to Re-Selection link under the reporting menu in ebis
 - Clicking the link will open a PDF of the Consent to Re-Selection
 - There will be no specific player information included form
